lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Management of 75 pct of all state enterprises passed from ministries to elected enterprise councils in 1985 and 1986, and a bankruptcy law in force since last September limits the duty of the state to save loss-making firms.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Basic changes in company taxation were necessary as varying taxes and subsidies gave a confusing picture, and minor steps taken so far had only improved things temporarily.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: MTI said inefficient firms were still being maintained at the expense of efficient ones, whose profit incentive was blunted by an average profit tax of 80 pct.
